mapper.sql: Id, BusinessId, TaskId, AttachmentName, AttachUrl, UploadTime
mapper.insert:
insert into Attachment
Id,
BusinessId,
TaskId,
AttachmentName,
AttachUrl,
UploadTime,

mapper.update:
update Attachment
BusinessId = #{businessid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TaskId = #{taskid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AttachmentName = #{attachmentname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
AttachUrl = #{attachurl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update Attachment set BusinessId = #{businessid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TaskId = #{taskid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AttachmentName = #{attachmentname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, AttachUrl = #{attachurl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: insert into Attachment (BusinessId, TaskId, AttachmentName, AttachUrl, UploadTime) values (#{item.businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.attachmentName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{item.attachUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, getdate());
